summary: I recently entered into the fandom, please accept this as my free ticket to enter into the fandom.  The anime and the manga made...
body:
I recently entered into the fandom, please accept this as my free ticket to enter into the fandom. 

The anime and the manga made me cry a lot, and smile a lot, and I’m still not ready for season 4 

Here are my fav’ boys : 
Crocs boy and Boom boy

I was so physically unable to draw Katsuki’s original hairstyle and I am deeply sorry, so I just… Make it with a hairstyle I think he would look good in.

I died drawing them.

Also, let’s call them BoomCrocs for now okay?

blog.title: (in)correct BNHA
blog.description: daily bnha incorrect quotes | instagram: @just_incorrect_bnha

summary:
Shinsou: Aren’t you sugar, spice, and everything nice.
Kaminari: Well, aren’t you rudeness, sarcasm, and everything......
body:
Shinsou: Aren’t you sugar, spice, and everything nice.

Kaminari: Well, aren’t you rudeness, sarcasm, and everything… uh…

Shinsou: No, go on. You find something that rhymes with sarcasm and makes sense, and I’ll take the fall tonight.

blog.name: obito-is-love
blog.title: Obito Is Love
blog.description: An anime blog solely dedicated to my favorite art form! The majority of my posts are queued so that I don't spam the dashboard, as well as screenshots and music from my favorite osts that I've posted here. I like to capture my favorite moments from every episode I watch, hence the multiple screenshots per post. Apologies in advance for my obsessive tendencies! I tend to marathon shows.

blog.name: write-yourself-a-river
blog.title: All These Prompts And I Still Can't Find A Fic
blog.description:
This is a prompt blog. Most of these prompts will be by me and they'll be limited to fandoms I know.

Submissions are acceptable so long as they follow the rules, if not I'll just delete them.

summary:
Fandom: Boku no Hero Academia Characters: Midoriya Inko, Villains, Midoriya Izuku Warnings: Character Death(s) Prompt: 

Inko is...
body:
Fandom: Boku no Hero Academia
Characters: Midoriya Inko, Villains, Midoriya Izuku
Warnings: Character Death(s)

Prompt: Inko is a survivor of an accident that took away her parents. As it turns out, it wasn’t an accident but a villain who doesn’t like leaving survivors. Izuku counts as he wouldn’t have been born if the villain had succeeded.

- kunnskat on AO3

summary:
ALSO!!!
it’s totally bullshit that there’s only one practical exam for U.A. and it focuses almost solely on combat quirks, and...
body:
ALSO!!!

it’s totally bullshit that there’s only one practical exam for U.A. and it focuses almost solely on combat quirks, and even worse, combat quirks that work on non-organic things!

if you think about some of the pro heroes we know, a good portion of them have quirks that wouldn’t do very well in the practical exam.

of course, we are led to believe the practical exam changes each year, so it’s not always the one we saw, but still

the practical exam should be broken up into different PRACTICAL tests. especially since some heroes specialize in other areas besides combat (rescue and stealth, for example) so testing those should be important too

like damn, no wonder U.A.’s acceptance rate is so low if they favor combat quirks…….
